annonsrubrik: Financial Analyst, Investment Banking Assistant Vice President
annonstext:
Financial Analyst, Investment Banking Assistant Vice President, Nordic Banking

Assistant Vice President
Stockholm - Barclays Bank Ireland PLC Filial Sweden

Are you ready to help us define the future of global finance?

Barclays is a global investment bank, providing large corporate, government and institutional clients with a full spectrum of strategic advisory, financing and risk management solutions. Barclays is one of the world's largest and most respected financial institutions, with a heritage of success, quality and innovation stretching back over 325 years. Operating in 50 countries and employing around 85,000 people across the globe, we help millions of communities, millions of individuals and millions of businesses thrive. And we've created financial solutions and technology that the world now takes for granted.

We are seeking an experienced financial analyst for a position as Investment Banking Assistant Vice President. You need to be able to take on new challenges, solve complex problems using innovative technologies and deliver world-class business solutions. Our collaborative environment means you'll be able to build solid relationships with senior leaders across the globe. 

Your work as Investment Banking Assistant Vice President will be on a range of products, including M&A, Leveraged Finance and ECM across all industries within the Nordic region. In this way, you will contribute to economic growth and help millions of people around the world. You'll work closely with clients, creating new opportunities for them, our colleagues and the communities we serve.

What we're looking for:
.	Strong academic background with Bachelor degree
.	Strong financial and analytical skills 
.	Experience in investment banking and M&A
.	Proven leadership abilities
.	Excellent communication skills in both English and Swedish

Full time
Until further notice
Monthly salary

www.barclays.co.uk
